resource.string: This building is being constructed, are you sure you wish to dismantle it?
You have insufficient funds to order this construction.
Left-click to construct this building, right-click for further information.
Click to mark current selection for dismantling.
You must be able to recruit the unit types locally and have sufficient funds to replenish this army. Cost:
Some of this squadron's details are unknown. Moving closer may reveal more information.
Undeveloped land||You can create new construction sites here.
You do not have enough funds in your treasury to upgrade this unit.
A trade route is required to export this resource.
The selected army is already taken. Please select another before declaring ready.
"Left-click to select. Right-click to remove. Double left-click to duplicate unit.||Cards can be dragged to a new location to reorder them within the fleet."

Encourage||Some command ships can encourage other vessels within their area of influence, increasing their melee attack, reload skill and accuracy.||Once this ability has been activated, you will have to wait a while before using it again.
Some of this unit's details are unknown. Moving closer may reveal more information. Spies have a higher chance of discerning army details.
The defender in a coastal battle must have at least one land unit.
Repair damaged ships in this selection. Cost:
Number of consecutive land battles won
There is no path available from this unit's place of recruitment to the recruiting force.
Failed to join the selected game
Saving is temporarily disabled.||The game will auto-save throughout the campaign.
This army cannot reinforce during a night battle.

Damaged Building||Until repaired, its effects are diminished and it cannot be upgraded. It will repair slowly at no extra cost or may be repaired within one turn for 40% of its original construction cost via the Repair button above.
The selected item may not be dismantled.
Some of the enemy's armies have defected and will join you on the battlefield, however some of yours have also defected and will now oppose you!
Some of your armies have defected and will now oppose you on the battlefield!
Some of the enemy's armies have defected and will now join you on the battlefield!
You have the maximum number of missionaries already
You cannot afford to recruit this agent. Cost:
You can only recruit a maximum of one missionary per province each turn
Cancel repair of selected ships. Recouping:
You cannot save before a battle on legendary difficulty.
You must select some units before declaring ready.
Your co-op partner has been defeated, the game will end now.
has been kicked from the game due to VAC authentication failure.
Quick save/load is disabled on legendary difficulty
Sea export routes remaining - You: %d/%d Them: %d/%d ||This is based on trade ports in the capital's province.
You cannot sabotage settlement gates that are already damaged.
Loose Spacing||Loose spacing minimises casualties when under heavy fire, but makes the unit more vulnerable in melee and to charges.
The amount of these items you can own is limited. You currently have %d of %d.
Cannot attack your multiplayer cooperative ally.
Failed to join game: Player statistics unavailable
Click here to repair the unfinished building so construction can continue.
Close Victory||The enemy is broken! Death and dishonour are theirs today, but only by a single sword stroke!
"Left-click to select. Right-click for information.||Cards can be dragged to a new location to re-order them within the fleet."
You cannot add this unit as only one siege engine can be used at a time.
This building will be dismantled once your turn has ended. Left-click to cancel demolish order.
You must select an item before using this button.
The host has left the game
You have insufficient funds to recruit this unit.
Close Defeat||Victory has eluded your grasp. The enemy triumphs, but by little.
There is no alliance to cancel.
Most men lost in a battle
This fleet is too far from the shore or port.

Current rank: 5 (maximum 6)||A character's rank shows their overall level of skill, with each star representing one rank level.||New rank levels are achieved by gaining experience. With each new level you will be able to pick additional skills.

Current rank: 4 (maximum 6)||A character's rank shows their overall level of skill, with each star representing one rank level.||New rank levels are achieved by gaining experience. With each new level you will be able to pick additional skills.

Current rank: 6 (maximum 6)||A character's rank shows their overall level of skill, with each star representing one rank level.||New rank levels are achieved by gaining experience. With each new level you will be able to pick additional skills.

Current rank: 1 (maximum 6)||A character's rank shows their overall level of skill, with each star representing one rank level.||New rank levels are achieved by gaining experience. With each new level you will be able to pick additional skills.

Current rank: 3 (maximum 6)||A character's rank shows their overall level of skill, with each star representing one rank level.||New rank levels are achieved by gaining experience. With each new level you will be able to pick additional skills.

Current rank: 2 (maximum 6)||A character's rank shows their overall level of skill, with each star representing one rank level.||New rank levels are achieved by gaining experience. With each new level you will be able to pick additional skills.
Confirm quit? The game will end for everyone.
No repairs required for ships in this selection.
AI players must have some infantry or artillery units capable of assaulting fortifications.
Close Victory||Almost they defeated you, but you have snatched victory! The enemy dead are testament to that!
Unavailable. You have not met the construction or technology requirements.
Left-click to attempt to steal, right-click for further information.
"Left-click to select. Right-click to remove.||Cards can be dragged to a new location to reorder them within the fleet."
predicted, if selected units are garrisoned
Capture and hold %n provinces in conjunction with your cooperative ally, ensuring that one of you holds the provinces shown.
"Left-click to select. Right-click to remove. Double left-click to duplicate unit.||Cards can be dragged to a new location to reorder them within the army."
Close Defeat||Ah! The enemy have defeated you, but your valiant efforts were almost successful.
"Left-click to select. Right-click for information.||Cards can be dragged to a new location to re-order them within the army."
Failed to join game: Game not found
Cannot repair||You can only repair ships at a port.
has left the game; the game will now end.
has been dropped from the game; the game will now end.
This unit is in the process of being recruited, are you sure you wish to cancel recruiting it?
Release animals||Unleash the beasts of war!||The animals can only be released when you are close enough to the enemy, and will attack the closest unit to them.
Toggle Fire On/Off||When toggled off, the selected ship will stop firing and be unable to fire until toggled on again.
Chat Error||Failed to connect to chat room.
Balanced stance ||When using the balanced battle stance, no units will receive battle stance bonuses or penalties.
This force is inside an enemy zone of control and cannot move. Attacking the enemy is its only option.
You haven't got the required resource for recruiting this unit.
This option is limited to key battles in the demo. You must autoresolve this battle.
Siege weapons cannot join the battle as reinforcements
Maximum permitted amount of this unit type reached
A sea trade route will link your two capitals.
Not exported. Upgrade your ports to earn more money by exporting these commodities.
Left-click to select, right-click for further information
There is a disconnection to the online service
The general has been killed and his unit disbanded.
This building is very secure, making it difficult to sabotage.
Scupper||Scupper unused ships to save upkeep costs.
There is a character blocking you from constructing a building here.
The battle type selected doesn't match the map selected.
Miles covered with your armies and fleets
Click to recruit this agent at the current settlement.
"Left-click to select. Right-click to remove.||Cards can be dragged to a new location to reorder them within the army."
The defending force has complied with your demand of surrender!
The target is a well-protected family member and harder to assassinate.

Toggle skirmish mode||In skirmish mode units will keep a safe distance from the enemy.||Skirmish tactics can be employed to slow an advancing enemy or distract specific units.||Skirmish units are vulnerable to cavalry charges.
"Left-click to select. Right-click for information. Double left-click or drag to army to add."
Unable to declare ready as a player has spent too much on their army setup.
This will delete all selected files. Continue?
Cannot enlist a general||You already have a full quota of generals.
This unit is unavailable for the following reasons:
Failed to connect to quick battle

Damaged Building||Until repaired, its effects are diminished and it cannot be upgraded. It will repair slowly at no extra cost, or may be repaired within one turn for 40% of its original construction cost via the 'repair' button above.
Capture and hold %n provinces in conjunction with your cooperative ally, ensuring that one of you holds the provinces shown.

Cannot repair||You have insufficient funds.||Disband an unused unit or increase taxes to raise funds.
Left-click to select, right-click for further information.
This unit can be recruited from:
Failed to join game: Unspecified error
You will lose if the time runs out
"Left-click to select. Right-click for information. Double left-click or drag to fleet to add."
Toggle Mount||Mounted units will need to dismount to completely capture victory points.
This settlement already has the maximum number of agents within it.
A synchronisation error has occurred; the game will now end.
You cannot incite revolts in rebel provinces.
Left-click to select. Once selected, left-clicking a valid technology icon will begin research.
Crushing Defeat||There is nothing to take from this day but shame and dishonour. The enemy victory is remarkable.
Once recruited, joining this army will take additional turns:
The new settings will be applied once the game has been re-started.
Fixed artillery units are stationary and therefore cannot be used as reinforcements.
An overland trade route will link your two capitals.
You will win if the time runs out
There are no upgrades for this unit available.
You cannot demolish settlements and ports, roads, or speciality buildings at their base levels.
Your recruitment queue is full, remove other items in order to queue this unit.
You will draw if the time runs out
The host has left the game.
[[col:red]]There are no agent candidates available to recruit.[[/col]]
You cannot sabotage a ruined building.
Failed to join game: Rejected by host
The ports in your home province are at full capacity.||A sea route from your capital cannot be established.
Type /help for a list of available chat shortcuts for your current game area.
Cancelling the repair of this unfinished building will leave it in a damaged state. Construction on it will not start again until it has been repaired.
Left-click to attempt to steal this technology
The defending force refuses to comply with your demand of surrender!

You are unable to build a fort.||You must be within your own province and have a general to built a fort.||You also need sufficient funds and enough open ground to build upon.||You must either raise enough funds or choose a clearer area to build upon.
This target is naturally resistant toward your agent.
No settlement selected in which to recruit an agent.
This unit is not at full strength so cannot be upgraded.
This ship was destroyed in battle.
Left-click to set a goal for this technology.||The technologies required to unlock this will be researched automatically.
Failed to join game: Invalid password specified
"You cannot add this unit as it hasn't been unlocked yet. Keep winning battles to unlock more units."
The attacking force demands that you surrender!
You can only own a limited number of these items. You currently have %d of %d.
You dont have enough population surplus.||Upgrade your cities and build aqueducts (or similar buildings) to increase your growth rate.
Left-click to remove unit from queue, right-click for further information.
Number of consecutive naval battles won
Cancel replenishment of selected units. Recouping:
You must select units for the AI armies before declaring readiness.
Left-click to add points, right-click to see more information.

You are spending too much money and the upkeep of your armed forces is crippling your treasury. Unless taxes are raised or unnecessary units are disbanded, bankruptcy seems inevitable. Are you sure you wish to end turn?
File not found. Invalid filename specified.
Waiting for other player to finish loading...
Right-click to cancel stealing of this technology
Conversion cost due to local culture
Are you sure you wish to disband these units?
Left-click to move to; right-click for further information
Left-click to select. Once selected, left-clicking a valid technology icon will cause an attempt to steal it.
This unit has lost too many of its men and has been disbanded.
Cannot enlist a general||You have insufficient funds.
Fog||Reduced visibility. All ships and missile units fire with reduced accuracy and range, and enemy units are concealed by fog at long distances.
The host kicked you from the game.
You cannot upgrade this unit as your army is not in the correct stance.
You cannot recruit this unit until you have a general in your army
Toggle guard mode||This will put your troops on the defensive.||Guard mode makes your men hold position.||Even if an enemy unit routs, your men will remain in position and hold the line.
The general of this ship was killed in battle.
The ports in their capital are at full capacity.||A sea route from their capital cannot be established.
You cannot recruit a general at this time.||You have the maximum number of units in this army already.||To recruit a general you will need to disband one of your units.
You do not have enough funds to perform this action.
If you quit now you will lose all unsaved progress
Left-click to toggle this faction filter.
"You are attempting to manipulate a non-hostile agent into joining your faction. This is an act of war. How will you proceed?"
Cancel repair of selected ships. Recouping:
Decisive Victory|The enemy are dead, or fleeing to save their dishonourable lives! You have your victory!
There was a desync in the game, exiting...
Capture the provinces listed below to win the campaign.
Decisive Victory||There can be no doubt: this is a great victory! The enemy are dead, or running for their lives!
This is an area of ATTRITION. Armies will suffer losses here due to the extreme heat.

You must repair the first building in the chain before constructing another.

Host's game version differs from yours, you will not be able to join this game
One or more players are not responding; would you like to continue waiting or drop them?
A friendly force may be reinforced from this position.
You cannot declare ready as you have no opposition
You were kicked by the host.
This resource is not yet acquired.
Failed to join game: Game full
This ally has not requested your assistance in this war.
This unfinished building is damaged and all construction on it has halted. Select it and click the Repair button to fix it and continue the construction, or demolish it using the Demolish button.
Heroic Victory||This is victory: glorious, heroic, magnificent victory! Your foes are utterly crushed!
[[col:red]]You are already fielding the current maximum number of this type of character. Increase your imperium to recruit more.[[/col]]
Cannot repair||You have insufficient funds.||Disband an unused unit or increase taxes to raise funds.
Balanced stance ||When using the balanced battle stance, no units will receive battle stance bonuses or penalties.
You are currently researching this technology.
Left-click to order upgrade, right-click for further information.
Any arrows indicate forces that can reinforce this army in battle.
In winter, armies will suffer losses due to attrition if they are in enemy territory.
Unable to replenish some of the units in this selection, some are unavailable for recruitment locally.
You cannot declare war against your multiplayer co-op partner.
Men killed in battle (friend or foe)
supplies to be gained from first trade ship
Destroying these units will result in the loss of any force or characters they are currently transporting.
You were kicked from the game due to VAC authentication failure.

Aggressive stance ||Your units will try to rush the enemy. This stance is usually more effective when the enemy has missile superiority. Retreat will not be an option for any of the sides, expect higher casualties. ||Right-click for details.

has been dropped from the game.

Crushing Defeat||This is a shameful defeat! You've suffered a crushing loss.
Current effects||Successfully completing missions and facing certain game events will trigger short-term effects upon your clan or provinces.
Costly Victory||You are victorious, but at what cost? Many have paid the ultimate price.
Double left-click to move to; right-click for further information

The target has a very high loyalty rating, making him harder to bribe.
You are attempting to save over an existing file, overwrite it?
Units in your army are immune from winter attrition.
Waiting for a response from a network player.

Toggle fire-at-will||Fire-at-will allows units to fire at enemies within range whenever they see fit. ||The effort of constantly firing and reloading quickly tires your men, they will use their ammunition quickly, but not wisely.
Turns until this unit is fully replenished:
Click this button to cancel any action on the currently selected item.

Ships that move here will suffer attrition
Number of miles covered by your campaign units (land and sea)
A player has an invalid army setup
Chat Error||Failed to create chat room.

Protective stance ||Your units will use a defensive position, and will attempt to retreat if things get out of control. This stance is usually more effective when you have ranged superiority. Expect lower casualties on both sides. ||Right-click for details.
Left-click on a unit to inspire them, right-click to cancel this ability.
You are unable to add anymore units of this type as you have reached the limit of %d per army.
Units in your army are immune from desert attrition.
Balanced stance ||When using the balanced battle stance, no units will receive battle stance bonuses or penalties.

Continue?"

If you choose not to wait, the game will end for everyone
You cannot save games when playing in legendary difficulty, instead the game will automatically save during the end turn process.
Toggle loose formation||Loose formation spreads units out, making them much harder to hit with missiles, but greatly reduces their ability to resist charges.
You are about to quit the game. Are you sure?
